page.title: 06BOYS' GAMES
page.content: These are some of the games boys play in Tackley:{football, baseball, {cricket, rounders, American football, {snooker, forty-forty. When you play{'Forty-forty'}you have to hide and the person who is 'he' has to try and find you. If he sees you he has to touch the can and say: "I see.."(who-ever it is) and where they are. In{American Football}you start with a 'touch-down' and you have to run through the post. If you are fouled you take a kick and try to get the ball over the top of the post. If you do you get 3 points. You have 13 people in each team; 10 on the line, 2 defenders and a quarter-back.
